publicationStmt.p: Copyright 1908, By Friendship Calendar Co.New Britain Conn.

sourceDesc.p: (March 11) Four ladies dressed in different colored dresses stand, seemingly interacting with each other.
(March 12) An image of a lady, presumably Molly, wearing snowshoes that were from "Mr. Weir."

body.p: (March 11) "Erie Tea" is a key phrase that I noticed was underlined.
(March 12) Since "snowshoes" are necessary here, it must have snowed quite a bit. Erie never changes.
